structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Departments, Agencies And Public Instrumentalities; False Statements, Etc. In Procurement Of Supplies; Penalty

text.section: makes a material statement that is false;
omits or conceals a material fact in a written statement;
submits or invites reliance on a material writing or recording that is false, forged, altered, or otherwise lacking in authenticity;
submits or invites reliance on a sample, specimen, map, photograph, boundary-mark, or other object that is misleading in a material respect; or
uses any trick, scheme, or device that is misleading in a material respect;
